verses.roman:
rathe caḍi' jagannātha karilā gamana
dui-pārśve dekhi' cale ānandita-mana

synonyms: rathe caḍi'-riding on the car; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; karilā gamana—was passing; dui-pārśve—on both sides; dekhi'-seeing; cale—goes; ānandita—full of pleasure; mana—mind.
translation: As Lord Jagannātha rode in His car and saw the beauty on both sides, His mind was filled with pleasure.
